column2: an A.M. Eatery////If Snooze wasn't always so damn crowded every weekend
column3: I would be coming here every Saturday! Not only is the food great
column4: it's affordable too! I had the OMG French toast
column5: and it definitely lived to its name! I definitely felt like I inhaled my meal (because it was that good!)
column7: where it looks like he barely made a dent.
